titleStmt.title: The epistle of Erasmus Roterodamus, sente vnto Conradus Pelicanus concerning his opinion of the blessed sacrament of Christes body and bloude.
titleStmt.author: Erasmus, Desiderius, d. 1536.

publicationStmt.publisher: In ædibus Iohannis Cawodi, typographi Reginæ Mariæ,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A godly treatise of the blessed sacrament.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
